snippet: Early discussions involve putting most of its titles — but not Time, Fortune or Sports Illustrated — into a separate company with Meredith magazines.
abstract: Early discussions involve putting most of its titles — but not Time, Fortune or Sports Illustrated — into a separate company with Meredith magazines.

byline.original: By AMY CHOZICK and MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Time Warner Considers Spinning Off Some of Its Magazines
headline.print_headline: Time Warner In Spinoff Talks For Magazines
